Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Hyaluronic Acid, Organic Calendula officinalis Hydrosol, Organic Matricaria Recutita Flower Hydrosol (Chamomile), Pisum Sativum Peptide, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf powder, Sclerotium Gum, Organic Rosa

chunk:
um Gum, Organic Rosa damascena (Rose) Hydrosol, Organic Mentha arvensis (Peppermint) Essential oil, Organic Citrus bergamia (Bergamot) Essential oil, Glycerin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Populus Tremuloides Bark Extract, Gluconolactone

Direct
book: 0004-Sally B's Skin Yummies Peptide Booster Serum

chunk:
uconolactone

Directions: Apply 1-3 pumps of serum to clean skin and allow to absorb in. Can be worn alone or mixed with another moisturizer, cream, or serum to give it a peptide boost. Do not rinse off. Use morning and night, or as often as needed.

Warnings: Discontinue if irritation develops
book: 0004-Sally B's Skin Yummies Peptide Booster Serum
